param.name: Gallery width
param.comment: Adjusts the main gallery width

param.name: Gallery height
param.comment: Adjusts the main gallery height

param.name: Gallery Background
param.comment: Adjusts the main gallery background color

param.name: Gallery Background Image
param.comment: Sets the main gallery background image. You can upload images using the Upload BG button. Just remember to refresh the page.

param.name: Main Panel Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Tooltip Text Position
param.comment: Enter above|below

param.name: Main Panel Height
param.comment: Adjusts the height of the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Previous Image Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the previous image button within the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Next Image Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the next image button within the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Slide Show Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the slideshow button within the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Audio Comment Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the audio comment button within the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Image Description Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the image description button within the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Select Album Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the select album button within the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Image Strip Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the show image strip button within the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Image Counter X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the image counter within the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Image Counter Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image counter within the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Album Info X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the album info within the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Album Info Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the album info within the main panel.

param.name: Main Panel Help Button X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the help button within the main panel.

param.name: Image X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal position (in pixels) of the image.

param.name: Image Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image.

param.name: Use Embedded Fonts
param.comment: Use the fonts installed in fonts.swf. If you're having problems with some charackters, the disable this setting and the fonts of the visitors browser will be used instead.

param.name: Image Strip Scrollbar Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image strip scrollbar.

param.name: Image Strip Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image strip.

param.name: Image Strip Height
param.comment: Adjusts the height (in pixels) of the image strip.

param.name: Image Strip Min Scale
param.comment: Adjust the minimum scale (as a percentage) of image thumbnails when displayed in the image strip.

param.name: Image Strip Min Alpha
param.comment: When an image in the image strip is in focus (i.e. moused-over), the alpha levels of the other images is reduced by this percentage.

param.name: Image Strip Scroll Color
param.comment: The strip scroll are areas on the left and right of the image strip that indicate the scroll direction. This parameter controls the default color.

param.name: Image Strip Scroll Rollover Color
param.comment: Adjusts the color of the strip scroll when in focus (i.e. moused-over).

param.name: Image Strip Scroll Event
param.comment: Case sensitive! Use 'Rollover'

param.name: Image Strip Image Info Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image info when a thumbnail is in focus (i.e. moused-over).

param.name: Image Strip Image Info Vertical Separation
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical separation between the image name and image date/location.

param.name: Image Strip Image Description Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical position (in pixels) of the image description when a thumbnail is in focus (i.e. moused-over).

param.name: Image Strip Image Description Width
param.comment: Adjust the width (in pixels) of the image description when a thumbnail is in focus (i.e. moused-over).

param.name: Image Strip Image Description Color
param.comment: Adjusts the color of the image description area when a thumbnail is in focus (i.e. moused-over).

param.name: Image Strip Image Description Alpha
param.comment: Adjusts the alpha level of the image description area when a thumbnail is in focus (i.e. moused-over).

param.name: Image Strip Image Mask Curvature
param.comment: Adjusts the curvature of the image thumbnails.

param.name: Image Strip Image Shadow Enabled
param.comment: Toggles shadowing of the image thumbnails.

param.name: Image Strip Image Shadow Size
param.comment: Adjusts the size of the thumnail shadow (in pixels).

param.name: Image Strip Image Shadow Delta X
param.comment: Adjusts the horizontal displacement (in pixels) of the thumbnail shadow.

param.name: Image Strip Image Shadow Delta Y
param.comment: Adjusts the vertical displacement (in pixels) of the thumbnail shadow.

param.name: Image Strip Image Shadow Alpha
param.comment: Adjusts the alpha levels (as a percentage) of the shadow.

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Curvature
param.comment: Adjusts the curvature of the bevel corners.

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Width
param.comment: Adjusts the width of the bevel padding.

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Outline Thickness
param.comment: Adjusts the thickness (in pixels) of the bevel border.

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Outline Color
param.comment: Adjusts the color of the bevel border.

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Outline Color Alpha
param.comment: Adjusts the alpha level (as a percentage) of the bevel border.

param.name: Image Strip Image Bevel Color Alpha
Image Strip Gradient Enabled
param.comment: Enable the image strip gradient images on both sides. Set to NO if you change the background color.

param.name: Image Info Rowed Text Horizontal Alignment
Slide Show Time
param.comment: Slide show delay time in seconds.

param.name: Slide Show Loop
param.comment: Loop (Restart) the slide show after last image.

param.name: Help Guide Enabled
param.comment: Enable the help guide. Check strings.xml file for entered text.

param.name: Help Guide Y
param.Comment: Vertical position in the gallery of the help guide.

param.name: Album List Column Scroll Rollover Color
Album List Item Thumb Mask Curvature
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Curvature
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Width
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Outline Thickness
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Outline Color
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Outline Color Alpha
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Color
Album List Item Thumb Bevel Color Alpha
SpeedSense Enabled
param.comment: Enable SpeedSence. This will check the downloadspeed and adjust the resolution for a smoothless video stream
